ErrorIndex.title: Wrapper for index information inside an error.

ErrorResponse.description: Generic error response for REST APIs

code.description: the numeric HTTP error code for the response.

details.description: The optional details of the error response.

dictionary.description:
Dictionary/map of associated data/information relevant to the error.
The error "message" may contain {{name}} escapes that should be substituted
with information from this dictionary.

domain.description:
The "domain" for the error.  If empty, it is an EDA
core error.  Alternatively it can be an EDA application
"apiVersion" value (e.g. interfaces.eda.nokia.com/v1alpha1)
indicating that the error is specific to that application.
The domain gives the receiver information that they can use
to help them interpret the "internal" error code value, or
to find an internationalization translation for the message.

errors.description:
Collection of errors in cases where more than one exists. This needs to be
flexible so we can support multiple formats

internal.description: Internal error code in cases where we don't have an array of errors

message.description: The basic text error message for the error response.

ref.description: Reference to the error source. Should typically be the URI of the request

type.description:
URI pointing at a document that describes the error and mitigation steps
If there is no document, point to the RFC for the HTTP error code

Status.title: Status is a return value for calls that don't return other objects.

com.nokia.eda.notifiers.v1.ClusterNotifi.description: ClusterNotifier is the Schema for the clusternotifiers API

x-eda-nokia-com.ui-pattern-error: The apiVersion must be set to notifiers.eda.nokia.com/v1
The kind must be set to ClusterNotifier

spec.description: ClusterNotifierSpec defines the desired state of ClusterNotifier

description.description: A simple user provided description of this Notifier
description.title: Description

providers.description: A list of references to Providers to send to for notifications matching any source in this Notifier
providers.title: Providers

alarms.description: Include alarm sources in this notifier

exclude.description:
A list of alarm excludes for this Notifier, matching the 'kind' field within alarms.
If a source matches both the 'sources' and 'excludes' lists, it will be excluded.
For example, 'InterfaceMemberDown'.
exclude.title: Exclude

include.description:
A list of alarms that this Notifier will listen to, matching the 'kind' field within alarms.
Including all alarms is indicated using the '*' wildcard.
For example, 'InterfaceDown'.
include.title: Include

namespaces.description:
Namespaces to consider when selecting alarms for this Notifier.
Alarms from these namespaces will be either included or excluded based on the other filters.
namespaces.title: Namespaces

alarms.title: Alarms

query.description: Include a query source in this notifier

color.description: Sets the color of notifications generated from this query. Valid values are web color names, e.g. 'red', 'green', 'blue', 'yellow', 'purple', 'gray', etc.
color.title: Color

fields.description:
Fields to include in the query results, which can then be used in the template,
e.g. '.node.name' or '.node.srl.interface.name"'.
fields.title: Fields

table.description: The table to use for the query, e.g. '.node.srl.interface'
table.title: Table

template.description:
A template to use when sending notifications for this query. The template can use the fields from the query results.
e.g. 'Interface {{ index . "interface.name" }} is down on node {{ index . "node.name" }}'.
template.title: Template

title.description: The title to use when presenting results for this query, e.g. 'InterfaceDown'
title.title: Title

where.description: A where clause to use for the query, e.g. 'oper-state = down'. You can omit enclosing parentheses.
where.title: Where

query.title: Query

spec.title: Specification

status.description: ClusterNotifierStatus defines the observed state of ClusterNotifier
status.title: Status

com.nokia.eda.notifiers.v1.ClusterNotifi.description: ClusterNotifierList is a list of clusternotifiers

x-eda-nokia-com.ui-pattern-error: A valid name is made up of one or more components where each component is separated by period characters.  Each component must start and end with a lower case alphanumeric character and the body of the component is made up of zero or more lower case alphanumeric and hyphen characters.

The kind must be set to ClusterProvider

description.title: Description

uri.description:
A URI to send notifications to. For example 'slack://token-a/token-b/token-c',
or 'discord://discord.com/api/webhooks/channel/token'.
uri.title: URI

spec.title: Specification

status.description: ClusterProviderStatus defines the observed state of ClusterProvider

delete.description:
Delete all instances of ClusterNotifier.  If ClusterNotifier is a namespaced resource, all instances in all namespaces will
be deleted, and this is restricted to users with the system-administrator role.
If a non-namespaced ClusterNotifier, it deletes all instances of that non-namespaced resource.

parameters.description: a label selector string to filter the set of CRs deleted based on CR labels
parameters.name: label-selector

default.description: Details of an error in response to an API REST request.
